title: Julie’s Plantopia
text: I’m a 4th year PhD candidate in the Kevin Griffin Lab at Columbia University’s Ecology, Evolution & Environmental Biology Department. My research projects spans the fields of plant-ecophysiology, global change biology, ecosystem ecology, modeling, and remote sensing.

title: Julie’s Plantopia
text: I’m a 4th year PhD candidate in the Kevin Griffin Lab at Columbia University’s Ecology, Evolution & Environmental Biology Department. My research projects spans the fields of plant-ecophysiology, global change biology, ecosystem ecology, modeling, and remote sensing.
